text: Language workbench to create Domain-Specific Languages ReleasesThe Second Release of the MPS 2025.2 Early Access Program Is Ready Today marks another milestone on our journey to MPS 2025.2. You can now download the second build of the MPS 2025.2 EAP and try it out! DOWNLOAD MPS 2025.2 EAP It comes with bug fixes and improvements, such as: Java source and target compatibility was raised to Java 21. VCS libraries are now part of the MPS.IDEA module. The UI has received numerous corrections and adjustments. Several chapters of the documentation have been updated and corrected. Feel free to check out the full list of issues we’ve fixed here. Additionally, you can try something adventurous and experiment with the new One Island theme, which gives all JetBrains tools a fresh look. Check out more details about the theme in this blog post from the platform team. Your JetBrains MPS team Subscribe to MPS Blog updates Discover more
html:
Language workbench to create Domain-Specific Languages

Releases

The Second Release of the MPS 2025.2 Early Access Program Is Ready

Today marks another milestone on our journey to MPS 2025.2. You can now download the second build of the MPS 2025.2 EAP and try it out!

DOWNLOAD MPS 2025.2 EAP

It comes with bug fixes and improvements, such as:

  • Java source and target compatibility was raised to Java 21.
  • VCS libraries are now part of the MPS.IDEA module.
  • The UI has received numerous corrections and adjustments.
  • Several chapters of the documentation have been updated and corrected.

Feel free to check out the full list of issues we’ve fixed here.

Additionally, you can try something adventurous and experiment with the new One Island theme, which gives all JetBrains tools a fresh look. Check out more details about the theme in this blog post from the platform team.

Your JetBrains MPS team
